Pre-Game Insights: The Indonesian national team manager, Sumardji, has sent a warning letter to the Bahrain Football Association (BFA) regarding concerns about laser attacks from Bahrain supporters.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bahrain supporters have previously been accused of using laser attacks against the Japanese national team, with a video showing a green laser beam being shone at the face of Japanese striker Ayase Ueda.
Others: The Indonesian national team will face Bahrain in the Third Round of the 2026 World Cup Qualification at the Bahrain National Stadium, Riffa, on October 10, 2024.
